# lazyimg

### NOTE

this lib depend on [appearjs](https://github.com/MrRaindrop/appearjs).

### APIS

* lib.img.fire()
* lib.img.logConfig()

### demo

```html
<style>
.my-img {
  margin-bottom: 10px;
  width: 300px;
  height: 300px;
}
</style>

<img class="my-img" img-src="http://gw.alicdn.com/tfscom/TB1hScdIFXXXXX7aXXXlQjeFXXX-1024-769.jpg">    
<img class="my-img" img-src="http://gw.alicdn.com/tfscom/TB1hScdIFXXXXX7aXXXlQjeFXXX-1024-769.jpg">
<img class="my-img" img-src="http://gw.alicdn.com/tfscom/TB1hScdIFXXXXX7aXXXlQjeFXXX-1024-769.jpg">
<img class="my-img" img-src="http://gw.alicdn.com/tfscom/TB1hScdIFXXXXX7aXXXlQjeFXXX-1024-769.jpg">
<img class="my-img" img-src="http://gw.alicdn.com/tfscom/TB1hScdIFXXXXX7aXXXlQjeFXXX-1024-769.jpg">
<img class="my-img" img-src="http://gw.alicdn.com/tfscom/TB1hScdIFXXXXX7aXXXlQjeFXXX-1024-769.jpg">
<img class="my-img" img-src="http://gw.alicdn.com/tfscom/TB1hScdIFXXXXX7aXXXlQjeFXXX-1024-769.jpg">
<img class="my-img" img-src="http://gw.alicdn.com/tfscom/TB1hScdIFXXXXX7aXXXlQjeFXXX-1024-769.jpg">
<img class="my-img" img-src="http://gw.alicdn.com/tfscom/TB1hScdIFXXXXX7aXXXlQjeFXXX-1024-769.jpg">
    
<script>
  lib.img.fire();
</script>
```
